title: RobbyN789
author: RobbyN789
content: Further to a previous threat re setting up bitcoin.Metrobank.  ( aware this is a bitcoin forum...but i am totally unsure whether this is to do with bitcoin or not? )A online casino asking me to setup metrobank to transfer a few hundred pounds. Saying my mastercard doesnt work / and i am reluncant to setup and use bitcoin.So...metrobank?  any the wise or avoid?

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Can you post a link to the old thread you talk about, for us to have a follow up on the discussion. Because at this point you haven't given us enough information to discuss the with, e.g the name of the casino to see if any other members of the forum is playing on the casino. Quote from: RobbyN789 on December 31, 2022, 11:20:32 AMFurther to a previous threat re setting up bitcoin.Metrobank.  ( aware this is a bitcoin forum...but i am totally unsure whether this is to do with bitcoin or not? )A online casino asking me to setup metrobank to transfer a few hundred pounds. Saying my mastercard doesnt work / and i am reluncant to setup and use bitcoin.So...metrobank?  any the wise or avoid? If I get you correctly,  an online casino is asking you to set up an account with a bank to make deposits into the casino. If I may ask, why are you reluctant in using bitcoin for deposit when you have bitcoin as a deposit option and why should you even be reluctant to use Bitcoin and option ing to use bank wired transfer through a bank.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: RobbyN789 on December 31, 2022, 11:20:32 AMSo...metrobank?  any the wise or avoid? Metrobank? isn't it a regular retail bank operating in United Kingdom? and online casino ask you to open account there to be able to gamble? I guess you need full KYC to open account there? It looks super suspicious. Avoid it. There are a lot of good online casinos that does not require that. Grab a list and research them- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5341966.160

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Hey OP, according to what @Tytanowy Janusz said, you should also learn to create a thread on the appropriate board to enable you to get a better response from members. If you have concerns relating to gambling, casinos, and games, you should take them to the gambling board, or better yet, drop your questions on the beginners and help board.Every casino has their logic, but specifically telling you to create an account on Metrobank looks suspicious. Look at the casinos on the link provided by @Tytanowy Janusz.
